description.narrative: Pre-study to develop cooperation Statistics Sweden-BBS

Statistiska Centralbyrån skall under 2016 genomföra en förstudie för stöd till Bangladesh Bureau of Statistics (BBS). Förstudien skall genomföras i flera steg i enlighet med SCBs standardförfarande, se bifogad uppdragsbeskrivning. Förstudien skall resultera i en rapport där SCB skall beskriva kapacitetsbehov hos BBS samt områden där stöd från SCB är relevant och möjligt. Denna rapport skall därefter ligga till grund för ett utarbetat projektförslag för ett flerårigt svenskt stöd till BBS genom SCB. Detta förslag skall särskilt beakta områden av relevans för genomförandet av den svenska Resultatstrategin för Utveckingssamarbete med bagladesh 2014-2020 (jämställdhet, miljö och klimat samt arbetsmarknadsfrågor).

The over all objective for the project is increased access to quality statistics in society by supporting the position of BBS as the central statistics institution. The below sub objectives are linked to the activity plan and theory of change. They are linked to the cross cutting themes methodology and managment as well as communition and the thematic areas for trustworthly statistics on gender, labor, environmental and climate change. A. Statistical Methodology - BBS has a well-functioning methodology unit with skilled staff that is able to support both the organization and the civil society, in a range of methodology-related issues. B. Management of a National statistics institute - BBS is a well-organized statistical institution, with a committed and professional management, that always strive for statistics to be published in a timely, user-friendly, reliable and accurate manner. The expectation is that this work will result in a stronger BBS capacity as the lead agent in statistics methodology development. 1. Labour Market - The statistical officers at the labour force statistics wing have the ability to produce regular statistics in line with user needs, in a correct and sustainable manner. 2. Gender - BBS is producing and making gender statistics available for a wide-range of surveys at BBS, in accordance with user needs. 3. Environment - The environmental statistics and accounts is under development, in accordance with SEEA, System of Environmental-Economic Accounting - standard. Beside this there is a mainstreamed communication goal; BBS will have accessable and disseminated statistics. The work towards this goal will support the project to disseminate the trustworthly statistics in a good manner, well packaged and easy to access.

Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation

description.narrative: For the reader: TO BE NOTED: The above-mentioned objectives in the first table - under the title: Objective of the intervention - are the objectives of the new intervention; the project between Statistics Sweden and BBS. There for the results of the baseline study is also described within this table, together with the results. ________________________________________________________________________ This intervention has one main objective; to produce a baseline- study for a proposed bilateral exchange between Statistics Sweden and Bangladesh Bureau of Statistics based on the needs in Bangladesh of a well-functioned and democratic statistic institution. The baseline study was performed during 2016 and a final version was sent to the Embassy of Sweden in Dhaka on August 21, 2016. The sub-objectives of the fact-finding report was to identify potential areas of cooperation between the two authorities. The idea of the study was also to identify other donor´s activities within the field of statistics and potential initial risks for a possible cooperation project between Statistics Sweden and Bangladesh Bureau of Statistics, BBS. According to the baseline study, the following areas were seen as the most important or a cooperation between the two institutions: Overall thematic areas: A: Statistical Methodology - BBS should work for a well-functioning methodology unit with skilled staff that is able to support both the organization and the civil society, in a range of methodology-related issues. B: Management of a National statistics institute - BBS should also enhance their organization and strive for being a more well-organized statistical institution, with a committed and professional management, that produces statistics in a timely, user-friendly, reliable and accurate manner. C: Communication and transparency: BBS needs to strengthen the work to make the statistics more accessible and to disseminate statistics. Trustworthy statistics should be disseminated in a good manner, well packaged and easy to access. The specific areas: 1. Labour Market - The statistical officers need to enhance their knowledge to have the ability to produce regular labor statistics in line with user needs, in a correct and sustainable manner. 2. Gender - BBS needs to strengthen the gender unit and make gender statistics more available for a wide-range of surveys at BBS, in accordance with user needs. 3. Environment - The environmental statistics and accounts is under development, in accordance with SEEA, System of Environmental-Economic Accounting - standard. A focus on this area within a new project may strengthen this work. Beside this there is a mainstreamed communication goal: BBS needs to improve accessible and disseminated statistics. The cooperation and a joint project may lead to disseminate the trustworthy statistics in a good manner, well packaged and easy to access.
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
